definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

containing_words.word: 聯合國難民事務高級專員辦事處

sentences.english: At no time, though, did Reagan ever criticize the United Nations specifically.
sentences.chinese: 但里根從未對聯合國提出過明確的批評。

sentences.english: Regional and sub-regional organizations could play unique roles under the leadership of the United Nations. Financial support is important.
sentences.chinese: 區域和次區域組織可以在聯合國領導下發揮獨特作用。

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 這是我擔任聯合國祕書長兩年多來的第三次訪問。

sentences.english: It was designated a world heritage site by UNESCO in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，聯合國科教文組織將它選爲世界遺產。

sentences.english: d. United Nations Special Rapporteur on the Right to Health, Mumbai, India.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國健康權特別報告員，印度孟買。

sentences.english: We're already part of the U.N. and God knows what else.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經是聯合國的成員了，天知道還有別的什麼。

sentences.english: 1951 - United Nations headquarters officially opens in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 1951年的今天，聯合國總部在紐約城正式運行。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki- moon has also extended his condolences.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國祕書長潘基文也對巴西火災遇難者表示哀悼。

sentences.english: FAO estimated 37 percent of children suffered from stunting.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國糧農組織估計有37%的兒童遭受發育障礙。

sentences.english: The United Nations estimates there are over 300,000 child soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國估計在世界上有超過300，000個童兵。

sentences.english: We will never forget that it was our brothers in Asia and Africa who carried new China into the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 我們不會忘記，正是亞非兄弟把新中國擡進了聯合國。

sentences.english: The UN force was strung out across northern Korea and not prepared for a Chinese attack.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國部隊在朝鮮擺開陣勢，並未防備中國的進攻。

sentences.english: The world is looking forward to seeing a dynamic and energetic UN.
sentences.chinese: 世界殷切期待一個充滿生機與活力的聯合國。

sentences.english: Once every four years the council subjects each U.N. member to scrutiny.
sentences.chinese: 人權理事會對每個聯合國成員國每四年會評估一次。

sentences.english: These five principles represent the crystallization of the UN Charter.
sentences.chinese: 這五項原則是聯合國憲章的具體表現。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon sent a congratulatory message to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國祕書長潘基文向大會發來賀信。
